Pre-Apocalypse[]: Nothing is known about Dino's life prior to or as the outbreak began.
Post-Apocalypse[]: At some point in the apocalypse, Dino somehow came into contact with a group named "the Saviors" which he subsequently joined. Dino aided his group in terrorizing other survivors and communities around the area into subjugating to Negan's will, where their victims would be forced to give half their supplies in exchange for not being murdered. Dino is stationed at Regina 's outpost and serves under the command of Mara . He is at the caf√© when the Alexandrians pull up in the armored vehicles and open fire. As Mara fights back, she hides behind a car with Dino and informs the nearby Saviors that they must push back. Eventually, Dino is gunned down and killed and shortly after, reanimates. He proceeds to attack and kill Mara just as she realizes the Alexandrians' true plan.
Death[]: Killed By The Militia (Alive and Zombified) During the battle, Dino is gunned down by the Militia and is left to reanimate. After the battle, he is put down by the Militia.
Killed Victims[]: This list shows the victims Dino has killed: Mara (Infected, Alive) Possibly numerous counts of zombies and unnamed people
